mapper.select: SELECT a.team_id, a.team_name, a.team_logo_image, a.since_date, a.division_code, a.region_code, a.introduce, a.created_at, a.updated_at FROM tbl_team_bais a WHERE team_id = #{team_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_team_bais (team_name, team_logo_image, since_date, division_code, region_code, introduce, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{team_name}, #{team_logo_image}, #{since_date}, #{division_code}, #{region_code}, #{introduce}, NOW(), NOW())
INSERT INTO tbl_team_member (team_id, user_id, player_number, role) VALUES (#{team_id}, #{user_id}, #{player_number}, #{role})
